name: Sparkling Seal
description:
APRIL FOOLS DAY!

You decided to drink a hibiscus tea, but it has some weird effects. You opened game-platformer that you want to play... And OH NO! Everything is meme. You must to complete 3 levels ending with hibiscus tea! IT'S SEALING TIME

Music: NairyBaptiste - T-Girl   

Special thanks:

Endeyshent Labs - a help with Linux builds
